title: Ravishing Radiance: Diamond-Encrusted Kangan Bangle
materials: G-H color). Features a meticulously crafted Hyderabadi polish for enduring luster.
features: This stunning Kada bangle showcases a modern three-row design, adorned with individually set, sparkling brilliant-cut diamonds. The open-work design allows light to pass through, maximizing the brilliance of the diamonds. The geometric pattern offers a contemporary take on traditional bangle styles.
colors: Rose gold with dazzling white diamonds
offering a subtle yet luxurious contrast.
occasions: and festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi. Its modern design makes it suitable for cocktail parties and formal events as well.
description: This exquisite bangle offers a blend of contemporary design and timeless elegance. The high-quality diamonds and rose gold create a piece that is both luxurious and durable. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting shine. A true statement piece that adds a touch of sophistication to any outfit.
